module.name: Camp-On
module.changelog: *2.9.0alpha1.0* #778 initial implenentation Camp On using built in CCSS
module.description: This module implements the Call Completion Supplemental Services (CCSS) often referred to as Call Camping or Camp-On. It allows a caller to request the system call them back when a busy or non-responding extension becomes available. Requires Asterisk 1.8 or higher.
